segments.text: Do you have a foreign tour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , where do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please look at the five routes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the route 5 is really charming . Must I make a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , right now it's the busy season .
segments.speaker: S2
